name: Aircraft Survival: Flight Simulator Planes Game
name_original: Aircraft Survival: Flight Simulator Planes Game
description:
Discover our amazing aircraft game with over 1.000.000 downloads!

Fly against other people in this survival mini game with airplanes.

You have 4 planes made of cubes to choose from 2 Passenger Planes and 2 Ultra Fast Jet Planes

You can easily pilot your airplane by tilting the screen of your mobile device.

Tap the screen to unleash the nitro boost and fly super fast!

The goal is to survive as long as you can in this endless aircraft survival game!

This is a perfect pocket edition for kids (boys and girls) to have fun with a minecraft type sandbox environment!

Twitter: @LabCave
Facebook: www.facebook.com/LabCaveGames
